title: narrow serif
content:
Can you please help me id this type with a big ear on g?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416043657im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Photo12_4996.png)
author: alpkan

comments.content:
Very close to **[ITC Esprit Book](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416043657/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=ITC&ffam=ITC%20Esprit%20Book%20-%20Regular&fid=c1ddef48f112056cf44a6f4c19dc4c1e&fsize=60&text=Magazijn&fit=1)** by Jovica Veljovic (ITC, 1985)  
probably manually condensed

-----------------------------------------------  
I found it using Find my Font - [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416043657/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
